name: Frene Simulator
description:
April 2021

Frêne Simulator was done for an assignement / scholar game jam during my first year of Bachelor Game Design.

The constraints was to chose two themes among different ones. For this game, we chosen Plants and Simulation.

CREDIT

GAME DESIGN

Axel FAUX, Mathieu SIBERT, Axel DOBRIC

PROGRAMMING & ENGINE ONBOARDING

PIXEL ART
